snippet.title: Capture Awesome Audio with Rode NT1 Microphone
snippet.description:
Rode's NT1 microphone is one of the best pieces of equipment that you can invest in for making content with a lot of voice work. I highly recommend testing it out and you'll definitely hear the difference between this type of mic vs cheaper alternatives.  

Equipment Links:
Rode NT1 Mic Bundle: http://amzn.to/2HQXlTE
Focusrite Scarlett Mixer: http://amzn.to/2FPzMOw
Boom Arm Stand: http://amzn.to/2u662ay
Zoom H1 Recorder: http://amzn.to/2ubnFGi
Blue Yeti USB Mic: http://amzn.to/2u9sMqp

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/buildthatapp/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
